recipe_1.name: Prawn Masala
recipe_1.description: This flavorful prawn masala is made with a variety of spices and is perfect served over rice or with naan bread.

recipe_2.name: Mixed Vegetable Curry
recipe_2.description: This colorful and flavorful vegetable curry is perfect for vegetarians or anyone looking for a healthy meal option.

recipe_3.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipe_3.description: This colorful and flavorful vegetable curry is perfect for vegetarians or anyone looking for a healthy meal option.

recipe_1.name: Spicy Masala Chicken
recipe_1.description: This is a spicy and flavorful chicken dish that is perfect for a weeknight dinner. It's easy to make and can be served with rice or naan.

recipe_2.name: Bengali Fish Curry
recipe_2.description: This traditional Bengali fish curry is made with a spicy tomato-based sauce and is perfect served over rice.

recipe_3.name: Shrimp Biryani
recipe_3.description: This flavorful biryani is made with shrimp, rice, and a variety of spices. It's a great one-pot meal that's perfect for entertaining.

recipe_1.name: Chicken Korma
recipe_1.description: This creamy and flavorful chicken korma is a great comfort food. It's perfect served over rice or with naan bread.

recipe_2.name: Mutton Rezala
recipe_2.description: This traditional Bengali mutton dish is made with yogurt and a variety of spices. It's a great dish to serve for special occasions.

recipe_3.name: Beef Bhuna
recipe_3.description: This spicy beef dish is made with a variety of spices and is perfect served over rice or with naan bread.
